mapper.insert: insert into SYS_MENU (PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, ICONCLS, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMARK, CREATEUSER, TS, DR) values (#{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adminflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{menutype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update SYS_MENU set MENUCODE = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUNAME = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAYNAME = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAYORDER = #{displayorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEV = #{lev,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENTCODE = #{parentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICONCLS = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLEFLAG = #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADMINFLAG = #{adminflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENUTYPE = #{menutype,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_SYS_MENU = #{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, ICONCLS, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMARK, CREATEUSER, TS, DR from SYS_MENU where PK_SYS_MENU = #{pkSysMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_SYS_MENU, MENUCODE, MENUNAME, DISPLAYNAME, DISPLAYORDER, LEV, PARENTCODE, ICONCLS, URL, ENABLEFLAG, ADMINFLAG, MENUTYPE, REMARK, CREATEUSER, TS, DR from SYS_MENU order by age desc,username asc
